title: A Season for Everything
description: Claire Pelletier's life is changed forever when she meets an Oxford professor who teaches her an important lesson. "A Season for Everything" is inspired by the Book of Ecclesiastes, poets and poetry, and the belief that to everything there is a season.~~~This novella is included in the anthology SPRING INTO SUMMER along with three other stories, also available separately. "Unlocking the Mystery""Summer Solstice""The Lottery"
author: Eden Baylee
